Package org.forum.server.graphql

Class GraphQLWiring

java.lang.Object
org.forum.server.graphql.GraphQLWiring
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomGraphQLWiring
@Component
public class GraphQLWiring
extends Object
This class is responsible for providing all the GraphQL Beans to the graphql-java Spring Boot integration.

Based on the https://www.graphql-java.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-spring-boot/ tutorial
Author:
etienne-sf

  • Method Details

    • buildWiring

      protected graphql.schema.idl.RuntimeWiring buildWiring()

    • addWiringForQueryType

      protected graphql.schema.idl.TypeRuntimeWiring.Builder addWiringForQueryType​(graphql.schema.idl.TypeRuntimeWiring.Builder typeWiring)
      Wiring for the QueryType object type. This method actually calls the getQueryType_XXXXXDataFetcher() methods. So, when you need to override the default wiring, you can either override this method and declare all the field's wiring, or override one of the getQueryType_XXXXXDataFetcher() methods to only redefine the wiring for one field
      Parameters:
      typeWiring - The Builder, on which you can for instance call the TypeRuntimeWiring.Builder.dataFetcher(String, graphql.schema.DataFetcher) or TypeRuntimeWiring.Builder.dataFetchers(java.util.Map) method.
      Returns:
      The builder
